Description: Powered by Frooition Pro Shop Search MusicMan John Petrucci JP6 w/Piezo Electric Guitar - Mystic Dream w/ Case Click here to view full size. Full Size ImageClick to close full size. Item Description 2002 MusicMan John Petrucci JP6 w/ Piezo Pickups Electric Guitar in very good condition with only light playwear and a small chip and a couple small dings on edge underneath the knobs (PLEASE SEE PICTURES). Beautiful Mystic Dream finish on the basswood body with black and chrome hardware and pickups. The guitar has a nice low action and the slim profile birds-eye maple neck feels great. The frets are smooth and in very good condition. This is an early model with the original compliment of DiMarzio pickups. The neck pickup is an Air Norton and the bridge pickup is a Steve's Special. These pickups have a great tone and sound powerful. Looking through forums, some Petrucci fans prefer the earlier pickups over the newer incarnations. The piezo has a nice acoustic tone and the center position of the magnetic pickups is voiced for single coil tones. With separate outputs for the magnetic and piezo this is a versatile instrument. Made in the USA. Includes hard shell case and the tremolo arm. Serial Number: G18805 Weight: 8 lbs. 1 oz. A unique instrument with advanced features and great style.The Music Man John Petrucci 6-String Electric Guitar has a maple neck featuring an adjustable truss rod and 5-bolt mounting to the basswood body for perfect alignment and no slipping. A sculpted neck joint allows free access to upper frets. The Petrucci 6 guitar's fretboard has 24 wide, high-profile frets. Schaller locking tuners and custom John Petrucci tremolo complete the hardware. 2 DiMarzio humbucking pickups were specially designated for the Petrucci model. Piezo bridge adds bright, natural string vibration tones to the mix. 3-way selector has a custom center-position configuration. Key Features Model: John Petrucci 6 Body Wood: Basswood Body Finish: High gloss polyester Bridge: Custom John Petrucci Music Man floating tremolo of chrome plated, hardened steel with solid steel saddles Scale length: 25-1/2" (64.8 cm) Neck radius: 15" (38.1 cm) Headstock size: Only 5-7/8" (14.9 cm) long Frets: 24 - High profile, wide Neck Width: 1-11/16" (43.0 mm) at nut, 2-1/4" (57.2 mm) at last fret Neck Wood: Select maple Fret markers: Dots Neck finish: Gunstock oil and hand-rubbed special wax blend Tuning Machines: Schaller M6-IND locking with pearl buttons Truss rod: Adjustable - no component or string removal Neck attachment: 5 bolts for perfect alignment with no shifting; Sculpted neck joint allows smooth access to higher frets Electronic Shielding: Graphite acrylic resin coated body cavity and aluminum lined pickguard Controls: 500kohm volume and tone - .022µF tone capacitor Switching: 3-way toggle pickup selector, with custom center position configuration Pickups: HH - DiMarzio Air Norton humbucker - neck; DiMarzio Steve's Special humbucker - bridge About Us Payment Shipping Terms Returns About UsWe offer a large selection of quality pre-owned musical instruments and equipment from the industries finest manufactures including Akai, Ampeg, Boss, Denon, Digidesign, DigiTech, Epiphone, Fender, Gibson, Gretsch, Guild, Ibanez, Korg, Lexicon, Line 6, Mackie, Mesa Boogie, Marshall, Martin, MusicMan, MXR, Neumann, Peavey, Pioneer, PRS, Roland, Shure, Tascam, Taylor, TC Electronic and Yamaha.
